DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare lens comfort Day 30 Air Optix® lenses care OPTI-FREE® PureMoist® ( OFPM ) Multi Purpose Disinfecting Solution ( MPDS ) compare Acuvue® Oasys® lenses care habitual MPDS .
DOC.brief_title: Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lens Clinical Comfort Benefits With Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution
DOC.detailed_description: Prior 30-day study period , subject fit study lens mask manner underwent run-in period 4-8 day adjust randomize lens .
DOC.criteria: Sign inform consent . Currently wear weekly/monthly contact lenses daily wear basis , specify protocol . Willing wear contact lens daily wear basis duration study . Currently use multipurpose solution , specify protocol . Vision correctable 20/30 ( Snellen ) good eye distance Visit 1 . Willing follow study procedure visit schedule . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Currently wear Air Optix , Acuvue Oasys , Acuvue Advance brand lens . Currently use OptiFree brand multipurpose solution . Must wear contact lenses extend wear ( overnight ) basis study . Known sensitivity intolerance POLYQUAD® ALDOX preserve lens care product . Monocular ( one eye functional vision ) , fit one lens , monovision modality wear . Use additional lens care product multipurpose solution within 7 day prior Visit 1 . Use topical ocular overthecounter ( OTC ) prescribe topical ocular medication , exception contact lens rewetting drop , within 7 day prior Visit 1 . Any abnormal ocular condition observe Visit 1 slitlamp examination . Current history ocular infection ( i.e. , microbial keratitis , conjunctivitis ) severe inflammation ( i.e. , iritis , infiltrates ) within 6 month prior Visit 1 . Ocular surgery within 12 month prior Visit 1 . Any systemic disease Visit 1 ( include allergy , respiratory infection cold ) affect eye could exacerbate use contact lenses contact lens solution . Participation clinical study within 30 day Visit 1 . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
